sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Swahili: Kilio cha vita kwa haki kilikuwa kikubwa sana kwa gharia ya mamlaka.
backtrans: The cry of war fairly was very large for the Gharia of Authority.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Swahili: Uamuzi wa utawala unachukua ajenda ya msingi.
backtrans: The decision of the administration takes the basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Swahili: Jumuiya ilikuwa na wasiwasi juu ya kupita kwa mageuzi yaliyohitajika.
backtrans: The community was concerned about the passing of the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Swahili: Tank ya kufikiri ilichapisha karatasi kuelezea msamaha wao wa adhabu ya kifo.
backtrans: The thinking tank published a paper to describe their death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Augght left the validity of the request.

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Swahili: Rais aliwahimiza mawaziri wake kupigia kama msaada muhimu wa upinzani kwa mpango wake wa kiuchumi ulikuwa juu ya buckle.
backtrans: The President urged his ministers to ring as a key resistance to his economic plan was on buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Swahili: Wapiga kura walipigwa ili kuona muswada huo ulipitishwa.
backtrans: Voters were beaten to see the bill was passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Swahili: Hadithi ya mbuzi ya mwanasheria ilipigwa jury.
backtrans: The story of a lawyer's story was beaten jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Swahili: Uzuiaji wa EU ulipinga kuagizwa kwa mwisho kwa hatua za kupambana na kutupa.
backtrans: EU block resisted the end of the end to the anti-throw action.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Swahili: Eulogy ya fulsome ilitolewa na shauri la sly.
backtrans: The fulsome eulogy was released by Sly's counsel.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Swahili: Shirika la gig-uchumi liliamua kuvaa marejesho!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Swahili: Wanachama wa harakati ya kupambana na kiteokrasi ya mapinduzi yaliwaangamiza wenzao kwa nguvu!
backtrans: Members of the anti-guardian movement of the revolution destroyed their counterparts!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
backtrans: Artists have decided to fight with the archives.
